item.description: Our Multi-faith ministry,Pathways of Love and Light, offers a spiritual service the first Sunday of every month. The service includes a teaching on bringing spirituality into our daily lives, a meditation that reinforces the lesson, and then messages from loved ones who have crossed into the Light. It is an one hour service with light refreshments at the end. Open to all. Fee: by donation only

group.name: The Mount Sinai Life Transformation Meetup Group

item.name: Join us Mothers Day for our Evening Spiritual Service & Meditation
